DataElement.preferredName: Occupation Past Year Average Physical Activity Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to describe the average physical activity exerted while working at a job in the past year.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Occupation Past Year Average Physical Activity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Crafts, trades, professions, or other means of earning a living.C0028811: Occupation_Past; before the present time._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._The central tendency of a set of n numbers; lacking special distinction, rank, or status; commonly encountered._Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm)

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Crafts, trades, professions, or other means of earning a living.C0028811: Occupation

Concepts.definition: The principal activity that a person does to earn money.

Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:The central tendency of a set of n numbers; lacking special distinction, rank, or status; commonly encountered.:Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm)

Concepts.definition: Before the present time.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.

Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per approval by S.Shakour. mc 9/21/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc._Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Of comparatively great physical weight or density.: Of or related to the hands; reference to a task or activity being done by hand (as opposed as being performed with the assistance of automation or other supportive means).: Someone who works with their hands; someone engaged in manual labor.

Concepts.definition: Of comparatively great physical weight or density.
Of or related to the hands; reference to a task or activity being done by hand (as opposed as being performed with the assistance of automation or other supportive means).
Someone who works with their hands; someone engaged in manual labor.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Lifting Carrying Large Object Regular Walking

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Lifting Carrying Large Object Regular Walking
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition:
The act of raising something.: The act of moving while supporting something in one's hands or on one's body.: Of considerable or relatively great size, extent, or capacity.
: Something perceptible by one or more of the senses, especially by vision or touch; a material thing. (dictionary.com): Regular; conforming to a standard or pattern.: The act of traveling by foot.

Concepts.definition: The act of raising something.
The act of moving while supporting something in one's hands or on one's body.
Of considerable or relatively great size, extent, or capacity.
Something perceptible by one or more of the senses, especially by vision or touch; a material thing.
Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern.
The act of traveling by foot.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act of raising something.: A small amount or duration.: Regular; conforming to a standard or pattern.: The act of traveling by foot.

Concepts.definition: The act of raising something.
A small amount or duration.
Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern.
The act of traveling by foot.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Regular; conforming to a standard or pattern.: The act of assuming or maintaining an erect upright position.

Concepts.definition: Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern.
The act of assuming or maintaining an erect upright position.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One of two equal parts; a quantity corresponding to one half of the whole.: the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.: The state or act of one who sits; the posture of one who occupies a seat.

The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
The state or act of one who sits; the posture of one who occupies a seat.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm):Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.
A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
